description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. The Avatar Worlds relics have been stolen by Galactic Templars and hidden throughout the galaxy. Now the world is crumbling around you, and time is running out! Travel to the far reaches of the galaxy to reclaim the relics and save the world of Avatars!
description.short: The Avatar Worlds relics have been stolen by Galactic Templars and hidden throughout the galaxy. Now the world is crumbling around you, and time is running out! Travel to the far reaches of the galaxy to reclaim the relics and save the world of Avatars!
